variant.description: Flat word objects with headings and indexes
variant.system: You are an OCR agent that outputs structured word objects with headings and indexes.
variant.user:
Parse the entire worksheet and return JSON with `words` = [{index, heading, text}].
index = the numbering on the worksheet, heading = the group title (Goalkeeper, Unit 14, etc.).
text = the cleaned vocabulary entry without trailing punctuation.
Follow the JSON schema exactly.
Only transcribe the numbered vocabulary entries (ignore headings). Strip trailing part-of-speech labels like "(n.)" or "(adj.)", keep apostrophes/curly quotes, and never append punctuation that was not present.

prompt.system: You are an OCR agent that outputs structured word objects with headings and indexes.
prompt.user:
Parse the entire worksheet and return JSON with `words` = [{index, heading, text}].
index = the numbering on the worksheet, heading = the group title (Goalkeeper, Unit 14, etc.).
text = the cleaned vocabulary entry without trailing punctuation.
Follow the JSON schema exactly.
Only transcribe the numbered vocabulary entries (ignore headings). Strip trailing part-of-speech labels like "(n.)" or "(adj.)", keep apostrophes/curly quotes, and never append punctuation that was not present.
